name: Help from the past
description:
(Notice : This game was made for the Epic Megajam 2022,  some minor changes and improvements  may be made before Thrusday September 1st) 

Living in the Dark city of Neocity, controlled by the evils KB Troups, you heard about a secret well hidden in the fortress, which was built in the same exact place than a forbidden temple 1000 years ago.

Your family inherited an amlet, which allow you to spiritually connect with your ancestor from 1000 years ago, in the same exact place in space. With her help from the past, you will need to find a way to sneak into the fortress, and discover the dark secret of the KB Troups !

HOW TO PLAY ?

Use WASD keys to move, use "F" to interact with PNJ, items and others.
When available, press "SPACE" to time travel, and "TAB" to send an object from the future to the past.

Made with Unreal Engine 5.0.3

Created for the Epic Megajam 2022
